name: Seal of the Ninja
description:
Description and lore

Seal of the Ninja is a Stealth 2D lateral platformer which consists in infiltrating the enemy base to retrieve the secret seal.

The game is located in the feudal Japan. The goal is to retrieve the powerful secret scroll that the samurai have stolen. Use different ninja techniques to carefully infiltrate the enemy castle, executing enemies in the way, and avoiding lethal obstacles.
